comment: Why not dry hop it with an actual section of a cigar, the size of a dry hop?

Tobacco extractions are tough to get right. From what I understand, it's pretty easy to end up extracting too much nicotine and getting sick, especially when alcohol and aprolonged time frame are involved. When it would happen in fancy restaurants a decade ago, it was in a high fat emulsion (heavy cream), in high heat. More science than I care to worry about.
